Data::Perl::Number(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation Data::Perl::Number(3)

NAME

Data::Perl::Number - Wrapping class for Perl scalar numbers.

VERSION

version 0.002011

SYNOPSIS

  use Data::Perl qw/number/;
  my $num = number(123);
  $num->add(5); # $num == 128
  $num->div(2); # $num == 64

DESCRIPTION

This class is a simple consumer of the Data::Perl::Role::Number role, which provides all functionality. You probably want to look there instead.

AUTHOR

Matthew Phillips <mattp@cpan.org>
